p: Main chemical constituents: Various phytocomponents such as taraxerol, teraxerone, ternatins, delphinidin-3, delphinidin-3ß-glucoside, malvidin-3ß-glucoside, 3 monoglucoside, 3-rutinoside, 3-neohisperidoside, 3-o-rhamnosyl Glycoside, kaempferol-3-o-rhamnosyl, aparajitin, beta-sitosterol, malvidin-3ß-glucoside, kaemphferol, p-coumaric acid, etc., are isolated from C. ternatea [ 138].
